analysis.description:

	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a645f12336138f932bcdd3288d43b58128510c3.sol#116-123)

DEO.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a645f12336138f932bcdd3288d43b58128510c3.sol#207-208)

Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a645f12336138f932bcdd3288d43b58128510c3.sol#90)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/46/0x4a645f12336138f932bcdd3288d43b58128510c3.sol:
